channel.title: Ruby on Jake Klingler - Software Developer
channel.description: Recent content in Ruby on Jake Klingler - Software Developer

item.title: Tasting Table Restaurants
item.description: Built a mobile app for viewing restaurant reviews (lightweight Yelp clone), and a backend with admin interface and JSON API.

item.title: Laser-Tripwire Security System
item.description: Built a proof-of-concept security system with Raspberry Pis and laser pointers that sent push notifications to an Android app when tripped.

item.title: Student Programmer
item.description: Assisted with design and development of library web projects.
